title: A large-capacity, superhigh-rate integrated lithium metal anode with top-down composition gradient enabled by polyantimonic acid
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04243J, Paper
Yueying Zhang, Yi Guo, Kai Yong, Qian Wang, Meng Yao, Yun Zhang, Hao Wu
Lattice-water-containing polyantimonic acid is found to favor the construction of a large-capacity and superhigh-rate integrated Li-metal anode with unique top-down composition gradient of Li2O–LiOH–Li3Sb/Li via spontaneous phase separation process.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
